name: earthenware
description: Terracotta earthenware carries fire, soil, and time—hand-shaped earth becoming quiet luxury, warm to touch, enduring, humble, and eternally alive.

name: home décor
description: Elevate your home with decor that blends style and comfort—beautiful accents that turn everyday spaces into inviting stories.

name: architectural blocks
description: Terracotta Architectural Blocks adds earthy texture, warm tones, and timeless elegance—turning plain walls into statement spaces.

name: sculptures
description: Terracotta standalone artworks bring earthy elegance and handcrafted charm—timeless statement pieces for any space.
